page.title: 15Farming, Wickhambreaux.
page.content:
About half the land in our area is farmland. There are ten farms, some fruit farms, some stock farms, and some arable farms. On the arable farms they grow{barley, wheat, potatoes}and {cabbages.}On the stock farms are{beef {cattle }and{sheep.}The stock farmers grow grass for{hay}and {silage.}The grass for hay is harvested in July and grass for silage is cut in June.
{***** Stubble Burning ***** { There is a lot of discussion about stubble burning in our area; farmers don't like to plough stubble into the ground because it takes too long to rot down.
